pageContext.description:
The present painting is half-length portrait of a man with brown hair against a blue background. At the neckline his black gown offers a tiny glimpse of his white shirt. The sitter's beard is trimmed straight beneath his chin and he is wearing a signet ring on his left hand.
[Görres, cda 2016]

[cda 2014]
